name: TV Talk Network
overview:
TV Talk Network produces and distributes digitally-delivered Talk Shows called “TV Talk”, corresponding to each New Episode of every major television program. TV Talk programs are recorded by knowledgeable talk show hosts, discussing each specific new TV Show episode within hours of the episode airing on national television. The TV Talk programs are ready for audiences to listen to the very next morning during their commute (or anytime / anywhered) – delivered over the internet to smartphones, tablets, laptops, PC’s, connected cars, etc.

TV Talk users simply launch the TV Talk app (iOS / Android) or go to www.tvtalk.com, select their show, and the TV Talk show plays through their car stereo, headphones, or device speakers. Advertisers of network and cable TV shows utilize TV Talk to continue to reach these viewers (listeners) with their product messages.

The TV Talk Network includes a social element whereby all TV Talk subscribers have the ability to contribute their own thoughts and input about the TV Show via the TV Talk app, by recording a voice feedback clip, with the possibility of having their clip included into the actual TV Talk program. These feedback clips are also optionally posted to social networks such as Facebook and Twitter.

milestones.description: TV Talk launched their Alpha Phase which marked the first postings of TV Talk shows to the website.
